authors: Changes for Urban Shadows 2e made by neverthrowacat, previously developed Adam Brenner(@tuxtradamus), Ryan Sigg (@ryansigg), Steve K.
instructions: Version: 2.0 - Updated with Core 2e playbooks. Select your class, then check 'Lock/Unlock Class'. Drama Moves, improvements, corruption, and special playbook features will appear, then simply fill everything out per the Character Creation in the Playbook.
